OOC: I never received the message about the pod being reprogrammed, but ill 
believe you.

:: Rainchark ::

:: Steps out of the Stasis Pod tired and confused, but armed to the teeth 
with weapons.  Rainchark was a bot with a hippo beast mode (yeah, i know, 
"there are no hippos in europe".), and had heavy armor.  He was tired, but 
was ready to blast anyone, and anything.  He sees many bots around his 
stasis pod.  He reaches to his sides and grabs two rocket launchers.  He 
aims to the closest bot near him. ::

Who are you, where am I, and why are you here?
